title: Expanding Instructional Design in the Post-Pandemic Era: Contextual Approaches for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Customized design for pre-service elementary teachers adapting to post-pandemic educational environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the expanded scope of instructional design and technology (context, humanities elements, research methodologies).
Learners can apply instructional design for elementary mathematics education in blended environments from both micro and macro perspectives in an integrated manner.
Learners will develop at least three personalized mathematics education strategies using formative assessment tools.

resources: Keyword analysis data from 2,397 WOS Core Collection papers

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
